Orphanage - Non-profit
Umbrella of Promise is a non-profit organzation providing care and hope to orphanages in Cameroon, Africa. The goal to empower children without a home and means to take care of themselves.

Clean Code.
Clean Design.
As a perfectionist, the motto Clean Code, Clean Design applies to everything I do. When working on projects for clients, businesses and others, it is important that the work is done well and taken seriously. I pride myself of being the guy that represnts businesses and individuals image on the web, the least that can be done is to make sure the work is done correct; looks and functions great.
Profession Focus
Web Development is the focus of my professional work, I started off as Web Designer building and creating small scale sites for clients. Going forward I plan the move to Full-Stack Development to increase my knowledge and skill set.

Passion
Coming from a artistic background, I understand the importances of creating beautiful designs. Brand idenity when presented well (in my opinion) is the most important thing a business needs. As result I am passionate about create the best brand image that fits your business and provide the best value I can.
